@gulzm True. Also, de-stalking it. (Which I sometimes skip: too lazy). I don't like OO with eggs myself, but definately might help.
@gulzm (PS. I don't think cooking the kale would hurt: I'm just lazy. Spinach is also good!) This concludes 'Crap Cooking by Carla.')
@gulzm [3/3] or thereabouts. Tbh, I don't time or measure much. And sometimes the whites split a bit. But it's very welcome at 6am!
@gulzm [2/3] and beat the whites to stiff peaks. Beat yolks, season. Fold into whites, pour into dish, bake at like 200c for 15-20 mins
@gulzm [1/2] I use kale (don't pre-cook it) and cheddar. (However much I want). I butter the dish, add kale and cheese. I separate 4 eggs
@gulzm Good! Ngl, microwaving does change texture, but still tasty for up to 4 days. Buzzfeed was right, for once!
